'''hlón''' or '''hlóna''' (pl. '''hloni'''<ref>{{HM|WJ}}, p.394</ref>) means "sound", "a noise" in [[Quenya]]<ref>{{VT|48}}, p.29</ref>
==Etymology==
[[PQ]] *''slonâ'', [[Sundocarmë|Root]] *S-LON
